input_schema.description: Request format for Elevenlabs Music API

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The text prompt describing the music to generate
examples: Mysterious original soundtrack, themes of jungle, rainforest, nature, woodwinds, busy rhythmic tribal percussion.

composition_plan.description: The composition plan for the music

music_length_ms.description: The length of the song to generate in milliseconds. Used only in conjunction with prompt. Must be between 3000ms and 600000ms. Optional - if not provided, the model will choose a length based on the prompt.
music_length_ms.title: Music Length Ms

output_format.description: Output format of the generated audio. Formatted as codec_sample_rate_bitrate. So an mp3 with 22.05kHz sample rate at 32kbs is represented as mp3_22050_32. MP3 with 192kbps bitrate requires you to be subscribed to Creator tier or above. PCM with 44.1kHz sample rate requires you to be subscribed to Pro tier or above. Note that the Î¼-law format (sometimes written mu-law, often approximated as u-law) is commonly used for Twilio audio inputs.
output_format.title: Output Format

respect_sections_durations.description: Controls how strictly section durations in the composition_plan are enforced. It will only have an effect if it is used with composition_plan. When set to true, the model will precisely respect each section's duration_ms from the plan. When set to false, the model may adjust individual section durations which will generally lead to better generation quality and improved latency, while always preserving the total song duration from the plan.
respect_sections_durations.title: Respect Sections Durations

force_instrumental.description: If true, guarantees that the generated song will be instrumental. If false, the song may or may not be instrumental depending on the prompt. Can only be used with prompt.
force_instrumental.title: Force Instrumental

input_schema.title: MusicRequest

audio.description: The generated music audio file in MP3 format

negative_global_styles.description: The styles that should not be present in the entire song.
negative_global_styles.title: Negative Global Styles

positive_global_styles.description: The styles that should be present in the entire song.
positive_global_styles.title: Positive Global Styles

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

positive_local_styles.description: The styles that should be present in this section.
positive_local_styles.title: Positive Local Styles

lines.description: The lyrics of the section. Each line must be at most 200 characters long.
lines.title: Lines

negative_local_styles.description: The styles that should not be present in this section.
negative_local_styles.title: Negative Local Styles

duration_ms.title: Duration Ms
duration_ms.description: The duration of the section in milliseconds. Must be between 3000ms and 120000ms.

section_name.description: The name of the section. Must be between 1 and 100 characters.
section_name.title: Section Name
